doc.title: Historia de la television argentina
doc.plot: The complete story of the Argentine television since it's first days when argentina was the second country in the american continent to have television after the United States till the beggining the the new century. The explanations of the technicians like Edgardo Borda, Jorge Contreras, Alejandro Doria and Gustavo Peduto make an exiting outline of the details and the historical context.
